A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: 1st review I've ever written just to say plz don't listen to the bad reviews. If u want same ol same ol Star Wars that's been around for 40 yrs than this isn't your movie\, but if your ready for something new\, fresh and exciting strap in and take the journey. I only watch the best stuff and I'm a screenwriter of some huge amazing stories\, ladies n gents\, this was THE BEST MOVIE IVE EVER SEEN. Enjoy!!
